thread.title: CPPIB And Broe Group To Buy Encana Oil & Gas Assets For $900 Million
thread.title_full: CPPIB And Broe Group To Buy Encana Oil & Gas Assets For $900 Million

title: CPPIB And Broe Group To Buy Encana Oil & Gas Assets For $900 Million
text:
Published By: Fox Business - Today 
Canada Pension Plan Investment Board (CPPIB) and The Broe Group said Thursday they have agreed to purchase oil & gas assets from Encana Corp...
